text: Using users, you can configure who can edit your dashboards. Future versions of Homarr will have even more granular control over permissions and boards.

delete.title: Delete user {{name}}
delete.text: Are you sure, that you want to delete the user {{name}}? This will delete data associated with this account, but not any created dashboards by this user.

promote.title: Promote user {{name}} to admin
promote.text: Are you sure, that you want to promote the user {{name}} to admin? This will give the user access to all resources on your Homarr instance.

demote.title: Demote user {{name}} to user
demote.text: Are you sure, that you want to demote the user {{name}} to user? This will remove the user's access to all resources on your Homarr instance.

searchDoesntMatch: Your search does not match any entries. Please adjust your filter.
